value: 8399 - Social Services, Not Elsewhere Classified Summary > RUAH COMMUNITY SERVICES (formerly RUAH COMMUNITY SERVICES) is an Australian public company. Its operations cover social services, not elsewhere classified. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. RUAH COMMUNITY SERVICES is headquartered in Northbridge, Western Australia. It is headed by CEO Louise Kathryn Ardagh. For the 2023 financial year, the company reported revenue of $36.84 million. Its net profit totalled $14.07 million. RUAH COMMUNITY SERVICES forms part of the services industry sector.
